It is brand new property in Gulshan for office space only and this is a modern commercial building
Building Name-Aakash Tower
1	Location of the Project	Gulshan Avenue , Dhaka
2	Address	Tower of Aakash. 54, Gulshan South Commercial Avenue  Dhaka 1212
3.Building condition -Brand New
4.Main Usage -Commercial Office only
5.Building Made By -Aakash Developer (As a developer) 
6.Number of Lift-3 exclusive lift per lift-14 person 
7.Number of Stair	-2 Stair 
8.Generator Support-Full backup Generator 
9.Lessor	-Mr. Abir Owner
10.Typical Floor-4600 SFT per floor of the building
11	Tenant Acceptance for 100 % of floor  size	Full floor -4600 sqf
12	Monthly Rental per Sft	120 BDT Per Month
13.Car Parking slots-1 Parking for per floor
14.Lease Term-5 years 
15-Advance (adjustable)-12 Month
16.Lock in Period-3 Years &The Lessee will agree to not serve any notice to terminate the agreement during the lock in period.
17.Rent Free Period-The Lessor will allow the Lessee 1 Month of Rent Free Period to complete interior decoration and other required activities by the Lessee.
18-Rent Escalation-After expiry of every 36 months (3 years) of the lease agreement, the rent will escalate by 15%
19-Service Charge-For the purpose of using common facility the Lessee will pay Taka 12/sft to the Lessor or directly to Building Management Authority.
20-Security Deposit-Security Deposit The Lessee will pay 6 months rental to Lessor as Security, Deposit which will be adjusted at the end of the lease agreement (without interest).
21.Value Added Tax (VAT)- All the applicable Value Added Tax (VAT) will be on account of the Lessee. Lessor will not take any responsibility.
22Advance Income Tax (AIT)-At the time of making any / all payments to Lessor by the Lessee, the Lessee will deduct Advance Income Tax (AIT) Source.
23.Notice Period-6 (Six) months lead time in way of certified notice after expiry of the lock in period
24.Lease Commencement Date-From the day of signing the lease which will include the rent free period mentioned above
25.Renewal of Lease-The Lessee shall give written notice to Lessor of his/her
intention to renew the Lease at least three months Before expiry of the lease period. Should the Lessee and Lessor agree upon extending the lease under new and mutually agreed upon terms and conditions, the like will be communicated in writing within Thirty (30) days of receiving the said notice from the Lessee

intention to renew the Lease at least three months

days of receiving the said notice from the Lessee

property_overview:
We are offer for high quality office at Gulshan Avenue for foreign companies and it is very modern fittings for operating office in Dhaka

1. Structure of this building is Elegantly Designed 40 Feet Height Atrium Entry to Reception Zone. 

2. Round the Clock Central Security Surveillance System.  
3. The Facade is done with Unitized Double Glazed System, Low-Emission Glass which is energy efficient, heat resistant, sound proof and will protect you from blue-ray and ultra-violate ray. 

4. The SKYMARK as water chilled central air-conditioning system with three numbers of chiller 675 TR Capecity, Brand- Trane, Country of Origin United States of America, Shipment from Trane France Plant

5. It has synchronized, full-backup generator two numbers of 1600KVA from Perkins, United Kingdom

6. Deep tube-well installed to meet the supply water requirement of the occupants in addition to general water supply. 
7. The Skymark has water softner and cold water transfer pump as per BNBC Standard - KSB brand from, Germany
8. The Skymark has fire protection System with Capacity of 750 USGPM, Brand Clark, United States of America

9. The Skymark has fire alarm and detection system as per NFPA Standard, Brand HONEYWELL, United States of America 

10. The Skymark has Substantion and AVR of 1600 KVA, Brand Siemens, Germany
 
11. The skymark has Faced Liging as per the recommendation of the international consultant HBL Brand, Malaysia 
12. Overall landscaping of the Skymark was done by DJC Lighting - Thailand - & Australia

13. 4 (Four) world class 15 passenger Elevators are taken from Mitsubishi, Thailand 

14. A triple height elegant reception will welcome you and your guests while entering the complex. Sufficient security measures are installed including CCTV surveillance. 
15. 4 (Four) basements with 113 car parking spaces are having proper ventilation.

16. To make your interior space functional and usable, You will have ample opening as the floors are having 11.5 feet high ceiling. 

17. Finest Building Management Service and Facility management services by Shanta Holdings Ltd.
